structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Unlicensed Receiving Of Milk From Producers; Penalty
law.text: Except as provided in section forty-two E, any person who receives milk from producers without having a license under section forty-two A in full force and effect shall be punished by a fine of not more than fifty dollars for each consecutive period of twenty-four hours during which such unlicensed operation continues.
